title: Land divers of Melanesia
creator_credit: Karl Muller, Robert Gardner and Phoenix Films
brief_description: Documents the salient features of the intact culture of Melanesia, including agriculture, play and ritual of Bunlap on Pentecost Island in the New Hebrides. Shows the relationship between yam agriculture and ceremonies such as land diving.
creator_credit_for_label: Karl Muller, Robert Gardner and Phoenix Films
